title: Let Go of the Small Things
itunes:title: Let Go of the Small Things
description:
In this message, Victoria will teach that everything doesn't have to be perfect before we enjoy life. Have you ever been planning something and wanted things so perfect but it didn't go your way? We want everything perfect that we forget why we're celebrating. Don't look at the speck. Let's step back and see the big picture.This holiday season, we're all busy. There's a lot going on. Make memories that will last and we can enjoy for a lifetime.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
